Text: Thanks; hope you have more from the site

Ok, call me a hypocrite, I'm always a fan of free stuff. Music, movies, and porn. 
GHS is one of the few sites that I have paid for (got it for my girlfriend actually, which is very cool!) 
Dave that runs the site is not rich, and I encourage people who download this vid to join his site. Assuming you like the video that is.

Thanks for letting me rant. I am not associated with the site in any way.
